channel.title: ...at an AWS event on Amazon EKS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in ...at an AWS event on Amazon EKS Workshop

item.title: AWS Workshop Portal
item.description: Login to AWS Workshop Portal This workshop creates an AWS acccount and a Cloud9 environment. You will need the Participant Hash provided upon entry, and your email address to track your unique session. Connect to the portal by clicking the button or browsing to https://dashboard.eventengine.run/. The following screen shows up. Enter the provided hash in the text box. The button on the bottom right corner changes to Accept Terms & Login.
